availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of James Snider and Mary A. Snider. Married to Eliza Snider. Father of Nancy Snider, Sarah Snider, George Snider, Charity Snider, Louisa Snider, Mary Snider, and James Snider.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Greenup County, p. 21; Kentucky Birth, Marriage, and Death Records, 1911-1964, Ancestry, Deaths, Lewis County, 1924; Tenth Manuscript Census of the United States (1880), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lewis County Precinct 4, p. 9.
